data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Dakshina Kannada.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dakshina Kannada, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,041,261 who are far from you in Dakshina Kannada, Karnataka, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 22,986 believers in Dakshina Kannada to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Dakshina Kannada, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Sardar (Hindu traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Sardar (Hindu traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Sardar (Hindu traditions) people is yours.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Dakshina Kannada words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Dakshina Kannada that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Dakshina Kannada, Karnataka, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

location.name: Dakshina Kannada
location.people_groups_list: Bedar Myasa, Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions), Vakkaliga Kunchitiga, Vakkaliga, Valluvan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bedar Myasa (60,000), Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions) (3,900), Vakkaliga Kunchitiga (241,000), Vakkaliga (6,362,000), Valluvan (116,000)
